titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Sir Evan Nepean, Baronet, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is reporting the improper conduct of Captain Heathorn, commander of the Country Ship Rhaim Shaw. The Captain fled the Bushire Roads upon hearing that the Governor of Bushire had been imprisoned; the ship belonged to Mahomed Neuby Khan [Muḥammad Nabī Khān], the former Governor's brother. It notes that the ship was laden with valuable cargo from Bombay belonging to Bushire merchants, and that the ship itself is Persian property.
